dublin_core.dcvalue: This paper introduces a novel mobile phone based wireless real time ECG monitoring system And experiments were conducted to demonstrate the reliability and stability of the device This novel system not only addresses the contradiction between continuous monitoring and device cost but also represents advanced concepts of low cost medicine and personal health management
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-06T17:45:05Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2011-03-01
Zhongguo yi liao qi xie za zhi = Chinese journal of medical instrumentation
[Study on mobile phone based wireless ECG monitoring technology system realization and performance test].
